summary:
I could not find a nice manhole retexture in Nexus so I made my own.

UHD 4K Realistic Immersive Manhole Overhaul - RIMO !
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xbDPWdF.png[/img][/url][size=6] [/size][size=6]
[/size][/b][/color][/color][/b]_____________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

I could not find a nice manhole retexture in Nexus so I made my own.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/t8rYd8D.gif[/img]

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=4]OPTIMISED WITH ORDENATOR TEXTURE OPTIMISER !![/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=#a61c00][size=5]:: INSTALLATION ::
[/size][/color][/b]
- Extract rar contents to Skyrim\Data 

[color=#cc4125][b][size=5]:: UNINSTALLATION :: [/size][/b]
[/color]
- Delete smanhole.dds from textures\architeture\solitude

BACKUP YOUR PREVIOUS TEXTURE AT THAT PATH BEFORE TRYING MINE.

[color=#e69138][b][size=5]:: CREDITS ::[/size][/b]
[/color]
- me

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cHBguRZ.png[/img]
author: Elianora
